entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is a person who is wriggling into a crack in the wall. (The text states 'Travers, who was wriggling into a crack in the wall...')

entities.name: cart
entities.description: A cart that is twisting and turning through the labyrinthine passages. (The text states 'the cart began twisting and turning through the labyrinthine passages...')

relationships.description: Travers is with the cart as it twists and turns through the passages. (The text states '...then the cart began twisting and turning through the labyrinthine passages, sloping downward all the time.')
